Description: You dance around, releasing a flurry of sharp leaf attacks against a creature in range. Make a ranged attack roll, dealing grass damage on a hit. On the following turn, you may choose to use this action again to hit automatically, but if you do, you become confused at the end of your turn.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice rolls for this move change to 2d6 at level 5, 3d6 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
